email.productAdded: A new product has been added in your account.Go and check out!
email.productUpdated: There are a few changes done in the product.
email.productRemoved: Admin has removed the product which was assigned to you.

activities.submitOrder: Your order for $productName$ has been accepted. We have begun processing all components. Your Product is now in full production.
activities.editProduct: $productName$ design's for Primary Packaging/Label/Secondary Packaging has been added/updated.
activities.primaryUpdated: $productName$ of primary packaging has been updated successfully
activities.labelUpdated: $productName$ of label has been updated successfully
activities.secondaryUpdated: $productName$ of secondary packaging has been updated successfully
activities.formulationUpdated: $productName$ of formulation has been updated successfully
activities.primaryAccepted: Primary order of $productName$ has been accepted
activities.labelAccepted: Label order of $productName$ has been accepted
activities.secondaryAccepted: Secondary order of $productName$ has been accepted
activities.formulationAccepted: Formulation order for $productName$ has been accepted
activities.primaryCompleted: $productName$ production of primary packaging is $percentage$% completed and QC is completed.
activities.labelCompleted: $productName$ production of label is $percentage$% completed and QC is completed.
activities.secondaryCompleted: $productName$ production of secondary packaging is $percentage$% completed and QC is completed.
activities.formulationCompleted: $productName$ production of formulation is $percentage$% completed and QC is completed.
activities.allAccepted: Production on all components has been accepted on $insertDate$. Your product is in full production.
activities.primaryDelayed: $productName$ has been delayed by $days$ days due to the primary packaging component. Your estimated day of delivery is now $newDate$.
activities.secondaryDelayed: $productName$ has been delayed by $days$ days due to the secondary packaging component. Your estimated day of delivery is now $newDate$.
activities.formulationDelayed: $productName$ has been delayed by $days$ days due to the formulation component. Your estimated day of delivery is now $newDate$.
activities.labelDelayed: $productName$ has been delayed by $days$ days due to the labels component. Your estimated day of delivery is now $newDate$.
activities.primary: $productName$ production of primary packaging is $percentage$% completed.
activities.secondary: $productName$ production of secondary packaging is $percentage$% completed.
activities.label: $productName$ production of label is $percentage$% completed.
activities.productionPrimaryCompleted: $productName$ production of primary packaging is completed.
activities.productionSecondaryCompleted: $productName$ production of secondary packaging is completed.
activities.primaryQaBegin: $productName$ production of primary packaging is $percentage$% completed and QC has begun.
activities.secondaryQaBegin: $productName$ production of secondary packaging is $percentage$% completed and QC has begun.
activities.formulationQaBegin: $productName$ production of formulation is $percentage$% completed and QC has begun.
activities.labelQaBegin: $productName$ production of label is $percentage$% completed and QC has begun.
